name: VR Highway Moto Bike Racer
description:
Now it’s time to ignite your super sports moto bike engine to win the moto bike race at highest speed in a city highway traffic. The real off-road crazy moto traffic racer with extremely high quality graphics with beautiful surrounding graphical environments. Enjoy the amazing advanced real physics and fast-paced VR game play in this high speed off-road bike racing adventurous. Test your driving skills, reflexes and have extreme fun on high speed in crazy moto traffic racer simulator. Complete it successful with best time and you will be king of the road. Crazy moto traffic racer highway stunt rider is a combination of daredevil stunts, fast bike race and crazy drive on unique city tracks. An extreme physics based motorcycle virtual reality game where you can and enjoy fast speed motorcycle race in dangerous stunts VR box game. 


Let's download moto racing VR game and ride the thrill of adventure with a rush of crazy speed motor bikes. Boost your moto engine at max speed to unlock your desire moto bike to ride it on fast track. Moto VR racing game is full of fun. New top speed bike racing game is real moto riding game which gives you a feel of extreme road trip. Simulate your riding experience with a variety of speed motor bikes. Enjoy a new moto drag bike racing game with exciting levels and amazing HD graphics with smooth physics control. If you are crazy about racing VR game and crazy about bikes, then try this VR game to enjoy. Buy & upgrade new sports moto’s to boost your power.


Speed is what an extreme motorbike rider needs to get experience so play speed moto racing to achieve that level. Passing between traffic is very dangerous but now you can do it without any injury playing this awesome VR box game. This is a VR device game for everyone out there looking for new challenges and getting new skills driving a super sports bike. Be the most extreme and fastest bike rider to driving the super motor bike in VR highway moto bike racing action game. Drive your heavy bike as fast as you can maintain maximum speed. Avoid crashing your heavy moto bike with other traffic vehicles. Endless speed motorbike racing with different beautiful scenes of highway traffic, city traffic and offroad traffic. Crazy fun moto racing with speed booster and magnets which make easy for collecting many coins. Highway speed motorbike racing is the best choice for the moto riders to set up a challenging high records. Get onto a new challenge of bike race.


VR Highway Moto Bike Racer Game Features: 


• 360 degree rotation based gyro-meter
• Virtual reality gameplay like 4DUD & Cardboard VR glasses
• 360 cinema view, HD visuals, exciting racing tracks
• No time Limit, unlimited play and fun Easy to drive
• Realistic bike physics stunts & breathtaking visuals
• Family Friendly motorbike racing game in VR device
• Smooth and realistic bike control handling
• Real experience of superbike VR racing game
• Detailed environments with many variations
• Stunning 3D HD quality graphics
